message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the initial price of $1,150,000. I am willing to offer $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the value this product brings to your specific needs is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,100,000. This feels like a fair compromise, considering the potential return on investment you'll see.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still looking to keep my expenses within a certain limit. I am prepared to offer $1,075,000 for the product. I hope this proposal allows us to reach an agreement.
